org.vaadin.addons.criteriacore

Enum FilterRestriction.Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<FilterRestriction.Operation>
      • org.vaadin.addons.criteriacore.FilterRestriction.Operation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<FilterRestriction.Operation>
    Enclosing class:
    FilterRestriction

    public static enum FilterRestriction.Operation
extends Enum<FilterRestriction.Operation>
    List of supported operators Operators GE, GT, LE and LT work on both numbers and strings. Operators IS_TRUE and IS_FALSE work on booleans.
